sentences.sContent: The others barely glanced at it and went back to their shovels, almost enthusiastically, searching for the French Woman, but I went up to the body and forced myself to look at it closely.
sentences.sContent_eng: The others barely glanced at it and went back to their shovels, almost enthusiastically, searching for the French Woman, but I went up to the body and forced myself to look at it closely.
sentences.sCn: 其他的人几乎连看都没看上一眼，就拿起他们的锹，差不多都很热心地去寻找那个法国女人的尸体，但我凑到那具尸体前，迫使我自己仔细地看看。

words.tran: 热心（过去式enthused，过去分词enthused，现在分词enthusing，第三人称单数enthuses）
